What's New in Beast 1.0
Introduction
 
 

Getting Started with Beast

 
 
 

This chapter provides a general overview of the concepts and programming considerations involved in using Beast. Once you finish looking through this chapter, you will be ready to begin working with the Beast example projects and to begin integrating the Beast API into your own game development pipeline.

Topics in this section

  • Introduction
  • System Overview
  • Workflows
  • Programming With the Beast API
